Class FilterChainLink

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.business.filter.chain.FilterChainLink
public class FilterChainLink extends Object
Represents a single link in a chain of filters to be applied sequentially to an image. Each link contains a FilterCommand and may point to the next link in the chain.

  • Constructor Details

    • FilterChainLink

      public FilterChainLink(FilterCommand command)
      Constructs a FilterChainLink with the specified FilterCommand.
      Parameters:
      command - the filter command to associate with this chain link

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(WritableImage image)
      Executes the filter command on the provided image and, if a next link exists, delegates execution to it. Resets the next link after execution to avoid re-execution.
      Parameters:
      image - the WritableImage to process

    • setNext

      public void setNext(FilterChainLink next)
      Sets the next link in the chain.
      Parameters:
      next - the next FilterChainLink

    • getNext

      public FilterChainLink getNext()
      Retrieves the next link in the chain.
      Returns:
      the next FilterChainLink, or null if this is the last link
